message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NA, cs.CE, cs.MS, cs.SC 

The paper discusses the use of parallelism and load-balancing techniques in cosmological simulations, which are typically categorized under Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The use of adaptive mesh and domain decomposition strategies also suggests a possible categorization under Numerical Analysis (cs.NA) and Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science (cs.CE). The paper also mentions the use of pthreads and SIMD vectorization, which could fall under Multidisciplinary (cs.MS) and Scientific Computing (cs.SC).
